arts.ttl: Wales boss Bellamy enjoying 'sane' and successful altered image
arts.sum: Craig Bellamy hopes his successful start as Wales head coach has proved he is not the “lunatic” some expected him to be.

arts.ttl: I am not a lunatic – Craig Bellamy glad to show different side in Wales dugout
arts.sum: The Dragons are now effectively guaranteed a World Cup play-off, if needed, as the seventh best group winners.

arts.ttl: 'Bellamy is exceeding expectation!' | 'Wales HAVE to be at the 2026 World Cup'
arts.sum: Geraint Hughes reflects on a huge win for Wales against Iceland which saw them move into the top tier of the Nations League.

arts.ttl: 'You constantly impress me' - Jubilant Wales boss Craig Bellamy in awe of Swansea City star
arts.sum: The Wales boss has been hugely impressed by the Swansea City striker

arts.ttl: 'Unplayable' - the night Bale tore Iceland apart
arts.sum: BBC Sport Wales revisits Gareth Bale's wonder goal against Iceland as they return to Cardiff 10 years on to face Wales on Tuesday.

arts.ttl: Superb Wales player ratings as striker enjoys one of his best ever games in hammering of Iceland
arts.sum: Here's how the Wales players rated in the 4-1 win over Iceland

arts.ttl: World Cup qualifying draw seedings in Europe completed by Slovakia, Czech wins in Nations League
arts.sum: The draw seedings for 2026 World Cup qualifying groups in Europe were decided Tuesday when the last round of Nations League games saw Slovakia and the Czech Republic secure a higher status. Europe has 16 entries in the first 48-team World Cup and the other four places will be decided by playoff knockout brackets in March 2026.

arts.ttl: Cullen's double leads Wales to Nations League promotion with Iceland win
arts.sum: Wales won Nations League promotion as Liam Cullen’s first two international goals helped them to a 4-1 victory over Iceland.

arts.ttl: Germany denied by last-chance penalty for Hungary in Nations League. Sweden's Gyökeres scores 4
arts.sum: Dominik Szoboszlai scored a penalty in the ninth minute of stoppage time to deny Germany a victorious end to the Nations League group stage and show why Hungary is one of the hardest places to win in world soccer. After a video review, Szoboszlai stepped up to take the penalty and chipped it over goalkeeper Alexander Nübel to salvage a 1-1 draw for Hungary, which ends Group A3 third of four teams.

arts.ttl: Wales seal Nations League promotion after Liam Cullen sparks rout of Iceland
arts.athr: Ben Fisher at Cardiff City Stadium
arts.sum: Given the impressive strides Wales have made under Craig Bellamy in the past three months, for supporters the only dampener is that they now have to wait another four to witness the next step on this riveting ride. For Bellamy, who has the 2026 World Cup firmly in his sights, it has been an incredible start to life as a manager, now six games unbeaten. “I probably feel it was important to show people I am not a lunatic, I’m quite sane,” he said. “People thought I was going to be running on the pitch and pushing the ref and stuff, getting sent off.
